thony-ui.title: Thony UI
thony-ui.description: A sleek and modern interface overhaul for Minecraft Bedrock. Designed to provide a clean, professional, and clutter-free experience by completely redesigning every menu and HUD element for maximum clarity.

screenshots.title: Start Screen
screenshots.description: You'll be greeted with smooth motions and elegant transitions.

screenshots.title: Play Screen
screenshots.description: The roster has been completely redesigned with a visual touch.

screenshots.title: Play Screen (Menu Options)
screenshots.description: The play screen has been redesigned to visually highlight each world.

screenshots.title: Play Screen (Servers List)
screenshots.description: The server list has been enhanced for easier navigation.

screenshots.title: Chat Screen
screenshots.description: The chat screen has been revamped to offer a cleaner interface.

screenshots.title: Pause Screen
screenshots.description: The pause menu now has a fresh, modern new look.

music-ore-ui.title: Music Ore-UI
music-ore-ui.description: The Music Ore-Ui offers a sleek and modern interface that enhances the user experience with its intuitive design and easy-to-use controls.

screenshots.title: Music Screen (Main)
screenshots.description: The music player includes a variety of elements such as playback controls, customizable playlists, and an intuitive interface.

screenshots.title: Music Screen (Tip)
screenshots.description: This screen provides a helpful tip for users, showcasing how to efficiently use the music player interface.

screenshots.title: Music Screen (About)
screenshots.description: This screen provides detailed information about the music player, including its features and usage instructions.

screenshots.title: Music Screen (Open Menu)
screenshots.description: The open menu button provides quick access to additional options and settings.

music-ui.title: Music UI
music-ui.description: Custom music screen offering seamless integration and intuitive experience.

screenshots.title: Main Screen
screenshots.description: Easily manage and customize your playlists with a user-friendly interface.

screenshots.title: Open Menu Button
screenshots.description: The open menu button provides quick access to options.
